snippet: Monday’s highlights from around the Web include an argument for why the tech industry is to blame for overpriced toast. Plus, examining the popularity of messaging apps like WhatsApp, which are attracting Facebook’s users.
abstract: Monday’s highlights from around the Web include an argument for why the tech industry is to blame for overpriced toast. Plus, examining the popularity of messaging apps like WhatsApp, which are attracting Facebook’s users.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Messaging Apps Threaten Facebook, and $4 Toast
